code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ForgotPassword(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const handleReset=()=>{alert(`Password reset link sent to: ${email}`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 max-w-sm mx-auto mt-10 border rounded shadow bg-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-center",children:"Forgot Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Enter your email",className:"mb-3",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleReset,children:"Send Reset Link"})]});}export default ForgotPassword;
